snippet: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey has released a video of floodwater gushing into the Hoboken and Exchange Place PATH stations, which are still off line.
abstract: The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey has released a video of floodwater gushing into the Hoboken and Exchange Place PATH stations, which are still off line.

headline.main: Video: PATH Stations Being Flooded During Storm
